T06abhsubhu:5: tathāhyanena kauśalyena dvividho 'nuśaṃso labhyate - manaskārānuśaṃsaṃḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayānuśaṃsaśca /
T06abhsubhu:7: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣu sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃbane aikāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamādhānataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:8: vipaśyanāvṛddhayānu kūlyaṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ jñeyaparīkṣayā prajñāprakarṣagamanataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:12: saparigrahadehagrahaṇena bāhyasyādhyātmikasya ca rūpaskandhasya grahaṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:39: evaṃ caivaṃ ceti varṇasaṃsthānabhedaiḥ citrīkārateti tathāsaṃjñā /
T06abhsubhu:43: tathāhi śubhānāmaśubhānāṃ vā vipāka ālayavijñānaṃ nityamupekṣayaiva saṃprayuktaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:54: yacca tasya cakṣuṣo bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ yata āyatyāṃ cakṣunirvartiṣyate,
T06abhsubhu:60: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam //
T06abhsubhu:71: lakṣaṇataḥ saṃniveśato 'nugrahopaghātataḥ kriyāsaṃniśrayataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataḥ maṇḍanataśca caturṇā daśānāmaṣṭānāmekaikasya ca yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:90: spraṣṭavyaikadeśavyavasthānamāmarśanata ātulanataḥ sparśanata āpīḍanataḥ saṃsargato dhātuvaiṣamyasāmyataśca /
T06abhsubhu:108: avyavahārakuśalasyāśikṣitabhāṣatayā rūpe saṃjñā bhavati na tu rūpamiti /
T06abhsubhu:116: vedanāsaṃjñāvarjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhalakṣaṇatve
T06abhsubhu:122: cetanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇataḥ karmataśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:127: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:130: vijñānotpattāvindriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikārastadākāraḥ sparśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:133: ata eva tatpradhāno 'nyaiḥ saṃhartu na śakyate saṃstutaṃ vastu pūrvānubhūtaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:143: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:145: sthāmavānvīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo 'nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityevamādisūtrapadāni yathākramaṃ saṃnāhādiṣvabhyutsāhavastuṣu yojayitavyāni
T06abhsubhu:150: sāsravā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:170: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityayaṃ hetvapavādaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:171: nāsti duścaritasucaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti phalāpavādaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:172: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:185: tadvilakṣaṇatvāt na hi te ātmalakṣaṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:193: na hi vinā dehenā tmaparikalpa upalabhyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:199: rūpāmātmeti samanupaśyati vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyatītyetāḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:204: yasya hi yadvaśena vartate dāne viniyoge vā tasya tadātmīyamityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:208: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā,
T06abhsubhu:209: na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi //
T06abhsubhu:229: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:231: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:232: dauṣṭhulya vikṣepo 'haṃkārādidauṣṭhulyavaśādutpannotpanneṣu sukhādiṣu vediteṣvahaṃ mama asmīti vā karaṇāt kuśalapakṣāpariśuddhito veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:235: nimittīkāraḥ tasyaiva veditasya punaḥ punaścitrīkāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:236: manaskāravikṣepaḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya dhyānāntaraṃ vā saṃśrayataḥ pūrvasmāddhyutthānato veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:245: kuśalā(di)bhāvavacanaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ mohātmaka iti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:253: anabhipretaṃ karaṇaṃ parairbalādavaṣṭabhya kāryamāṇasya kleśābhibhavādvā yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:259: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vetyanabhyūhābhyūhāvasthāyāṃ yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:260: (Abhidh-s-bh 9) paryeṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanā vitarkaḥ pratyavekṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanānuvicāra iti //
T06abhsubhu:269: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:277: prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:283: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate 'neneti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:286: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva /
T06abhsubhu:289: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge 'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ veti karmakṛtaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:293: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham /
T06abhsubhu:294: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhāvitamā dhyātmikāstu jātijarādiprabhāvitā iti /
T06abhsubhu:296: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti /
T06abhsubhu:297: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:299: tadubhayāśrayeṣvi ti svabhāvaviśeṣādhivacanāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu a i u ityevamādiṣu /
T06abhsubhu:303: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati,
T06abhsubhu:305: naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum,
T06abhsubhu:308: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:313: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate,
T06abhsubhu:320: samavadhānaṃ tadyathā vijñānākhyasya hi hetuphalasyendriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti /
T06abhsubhu:322: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmavasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:344: upāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate /
T06abhsubhu:359: api ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ sā jātirnopalabhyate yāvyākṛtavipākasaṃgṛhītā syāt /
T06abhsubhu:362: tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānupāttateti na yujyate,
T06abhsubhu:365: api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate /
T06abhsubhu:366: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni /
T06abhsubhu:368: iti pūrvakarmapravarttamānapratyahetuto 'pi kuśalākuśalato 'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato 'pi pratiniyatāśrayato 'pi punaḥ punarupādānadoṣato 'pi na yujyate //
T06abhsubhu:370: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
T06abhsubhu:371: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī /
T06abhsubhu:375: tathāhi tatra manaskāro 'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo 'pi //
T06abhsubhu:376: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānasahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
T06abhsubhu:377: tathāhi yasmin samaye 'tītamanubhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ samanusmarati tasmin samaye 'vispaṣṭo manovijñānapracāro bhavati na tu tathā vartamānaviṣayo manaḥpracāro 'vispaṣṭo bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:379: kena kāraṇena bījatvaṃ na saṃbhavati ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāmanyonyam /
T06abhsubhu:390: na ca teṣāṃ tathā bījatvaṃ yujyate /
T06abhsubhu:393: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau karma na saṃbhavati /
T06abhsubhu:395: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante /
T06abhsubhu:396: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate //
T06abhsubhu:398: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vāyoniśo vā cintayato vānuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vāsamāhitacetaso
T06abhsubhu:399: vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante 'nekavidhā bahunānāprakārāste na bhaveyurupalabhyante ca /
T06abhsubhu:402: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt /
T06abhsubhu:406: tathāhi cyavamānasya vijñāna mūrdhvadehaṃ vā śotikurvan vijahāti,
T06abhsubhu:409: ato 'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca /
T06abhsubhu:412: mano nirvacanata ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:427: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāvanāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā /
T06abhsubhu:439: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparyayeṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam /
T06abhsubhu:444: te 'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa, (Abhidh-s-bh 15)
T06abhsubhu:449: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt /
T06abhsubhu:451: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam /
T06abhsubhu:462: mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti //
T06abhsubhu:464: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhātūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam /
T06abhsubhu:465: yadyapi caiṣāṃ dvitvaṃ na tu dhātvantaratvam,
T06abhsubhu:474: yathā dvayoścakṣuṣorunmiṣitayoḥ rūpagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati na tathaikasminneveti /
T06abhsubhu:475: tadyathā ekasminnapavarake dvayoḥ pradīpayorekaṃ prabhāpratānaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ dvau pradīpau niśritya varttate /
T06abhsubhu:477: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitraviṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam /
T06abhsubhu:482: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:483: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣiryasvalpoktito veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:484: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni /
T06abhsubhu:487: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:490: api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃbane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo 'kliṣṭaśca vikalpaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:494: animitto 'nāgataviṣayo manorathākāro vikalpaḥ śeṣā abhinirūpaṇāvikalpasvabhāvā veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:499: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādivijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti /
T06abhsubhu:505: tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt /
T06abhsubhu:520: kiṃ tāvaccakṣū rūpāṇi paśyatīti veditavyamatha vijñānam /
T06abhsubhu:524: api khalu ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ cakṣuṣo rūpadarśane prādhānyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vijñānasya /
T06abhsubhu:537: etacca yathoktaṃ sarva vijñānasya na saṃbhavatīti /
T06abhsubhu:539: yathā dhātuṣvāyataneṣu cāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyavasthāpitamevaṃ kasmānna skandheṣvapi vyavasthāpitam /
T06abhsubhu:542: sa ca nityasya na saṃbhavatīti na skandheṣvasaṃskṛtavyavasthānam //
T06abhsubhu:543: kena kāraṇena ta eva dharmā skandhadhātvāyatanamukhaiḥ pṛthagdeśitāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:545: tathāhi skandhanirdeśe ye rūpavijñāne samāsena nirdiṣṭe te dhātvāyataneṣvekādaśadhā /
T06abhsubhu:548: ye tu tatra vedanādayo vyastāḥ te dhātvāyataneṣu dharmadhātvāyatanatvena samastā iti /
T06abhsubhu:551: grahaṇāya dvārabhūtasya grāhyagrāhakamātrasya vyavasthānata āyatananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:557: ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya cakṣurheturiti tataḥ pracyutya rūpiṇi dhātāvupapadyamānasya yasmādālayavijñānasaṃniviṣṭāccakṣurbījācca kṣurnirvartiṣyate,
T06abhsubhu:559: kāyadhāturna kāya ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya yaḥ kāyadhāturityetadatra vaktavyam,
T06abhsubhu:563: jāto bhūtaḥ nirvṛtti vṛddhi cādhikṛtya yathākramam //
T06abhsubhu:568: yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīta iti yathānubhavaṃ nimittodgrahaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:569: yathā saṃjānīte tathā cetayati yathāsaṃjñaṃ karmābhisaṃskaraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:570: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavatīti yathābhisaṃskāraṃ viṣayeṣu gatyantareṣu ca vijñānapariṇāmāt //
T06abhsubhu:572: yatra saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti sendriye kāye /
T06abhsubhu:577: sā punaḥ apekṣātṛṣṇā abhinandanātṛṣṇā adhyavasānatṛṣṇā āmatṛṣṇā viṣayatṛṣṇā kāmatṛṣṇā samāpattitṛṣṇā duścaritaduḥkhatṛṣṇā sucaritasukhatṛṣṇā viprakṛṣṭatṛṣṇā sanikṛṣṭatṛṣṇā ca /
T06abhsubhu:578: asyāḥ tṛṣṇāyā ālaṃbanatvena yathākramamatītādayaḥ prakārā yojitavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:580: utpannānutpannabhedato grāhakagrāhyabhedato bahirmukhāntarmukhabhedataḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭabhedato viprakṛṣṭasaṃnikṛṣṭabhedataśvātītādīni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:588: tadyathā loke yena śarīrapradeśena bhāra uhyate tatra skandhopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:593: sarvaprakāradharmasaṃgrahaṇena sūtrāntaranirdiṣṭānāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāmanyeṣāmapi dhātūnāmeṣvevāṣṭādaśasu yathāyogaṃ saṃgrahaṇādveditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:597: eteṣāṃ punaḥ sūtrapadānāmartha ātmaśucisukhanityaviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathākramamanātmatāmupādāyetyevamādibhiḥ padarveditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:598: kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiriti praśnatrayavyavasthāpanaṃ lakṣaṇavastusaṃmohayoḥ samāropasya ca prahāṇārtham /
T06abhsubhu:599: tatra kathaṃ dravyasaditi dravyasato lakṣaṇanirdeśena tatsaṃmohaḥ prahīyate /
T06abhsubhu:600: sarvāṇi dravyasantītyanena vastusaṃmohaḥ prahīyate ātmadravyābhiniveśatyājanārthamityanena samāropaḥ prahīyate /
T06abhsubhu:602: abhilāpanirapekṣa indriyagocarastadyathā rūpaṃ vedanetyevamādikaṃ nāmnācitrayitvā yasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:609: yena saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti rāgādibhiścetasikaiḥ śraddhādibhiśceti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:610: yā ca tatrāvastheti rūpacittacetasikāvasthāsu prajñaptāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:613: punastrayodaśavidhasya vijñānasya yo viṣayaḥ tajjñeyamanena pradarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:614: tatpunaḥ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ laukikabhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ paramārthajñānaṃ
T06abhsubhu:615: paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ
T06abhsubhu:624: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇajñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:634: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāravijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam /
T06abhsubhu:635: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantīti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam /
T06abhsubhu:637: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti /
T06abhsubhu:638: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate,
T06abhsubhu:641: phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti /
T06abhsubhu:645: muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā
T06abhsubhu:646: samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:647: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svādayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:655: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasvabhāvastasmādasau rūpī,
T06abhsubhu:661: na tu yathā vedanādīnāṃ pūrvikā ca nāndo samudayaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:665: deśopadeśato 'muṣyāṃ diśīti vyavadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt deśagocarataḥ kasmiścitpradeśe sthitasyālaṃbanībhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:667: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi /
T06abhsubhu:672: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:676: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:686: yathā rūvitadātmato 'pīti vistareṇa rūpītyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato 'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:689: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvriyate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham /
T06abhsubhu:690: taddhyāvriyata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:692: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittakadevatāvata /
T06abhsubhu:693: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃbane vā dveṣa utpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:707: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramāryamārgamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā //
T06abhsubhu:709: yāvanti sāsravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:716: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:717: naivasaṃskṛtanāsaṃskṛtasya dvayāvyatirekādyaduktam - dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti /
T06abhsubhu:725: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:740: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam /
T06abhsubhu:745: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimokṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:761: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam /
T06abhsubhu:766: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:774: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:792: atītanirdeśādhikāreṇedamapi jñāpyate - kimartha bhagavatātītādīnyeva trīṇi kathāvastūni vyavasthāpitāni na nirvāṇamiti /
T06abhsubhu:800: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti /
T06abhsubhu:801: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:805: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va]caro 'naiḥsargikaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:809: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ puṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti /
T06abhsubhu:821: na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati,
T06abhsubhu:826: adhigamaniṣyandato 'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārthaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmemīyate /
T06abhsubhu:833: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:848: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:852: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyo nāvaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:853: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne /
T06abhsubhu:854: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca /
T06abhsubhu:855: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt /
T06abhsubhu:856: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇavairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā //
T06abhsubhu:857: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:865: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
T06abhsubhu:871: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:872: ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā tadālaṃbanāśca rāgādayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:874: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāsravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāsravā ityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:875: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena /
T06abhsubhu:887: na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:889: na hyanutpādikāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:890: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve 'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva phalamutpadyate,
T06abhsubhu:893: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni /
T06abhsubhu:894: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:897: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca,
T06abhsubhu:898: tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:901: sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chandarāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:903: tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye satyanyatarasmin gatiyonyādibhedabhinne nikāyasabhāge yathākṣipte nāmarūpādinirvṛtteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:906: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:928: nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt /
T06abhsubhu:945: upādānaṃ punarbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
T06abhsubhu:956: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
T06abhsubhu:976: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:989: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catasro 'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
T06abhsubhu:1002: parato vā ghoṣaṃ pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti /
T06abhsubhu:1007: jarāmaraṇaṃjarāmara[ṇa]samudayo [jarāmaraṇanirodho] jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi satyavyavasthānamadhikṛtya pratilomanirdeśo veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1009: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1010: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:1017: api khalu svabhāvato 'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati /
T06abhsubhu:1045: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam /
T06abhsubhu:1046: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti //
T06abhsubhu:1053: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate,
T06abhsubhu:1057: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā /
T06abhsubhu:1059: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena
T06abhsubhu:1064: nairantaryasamanantarato 'pīti nāvaśyaṃ kṣaṇanairantarya kiṃtarhi cittāntaranairantaryamapyatra nairantarya draṣṭavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1065: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt /
T06abhsubhu:1067: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 38)
T06abhsubhu:1070: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato 'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1072: tadyathā kāmāvacarā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ cānantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1073: evaṃ rūpāvacarādayo 'pi pṛthagpṛthagrūpāvacarādonāṃ kāmāvacarādīnāṃ cā[na]ntarotpannānāmiti yojayitavyam //
T06abhsubhu:1074: kiṃ khalu sarvasya cintasyānantaraṃ sarva cittamutpadyate,
T06abhsubhu:1077: avaitasya cittasyānantaramidaṃ cedaṃ ca cittamutpadyata ityucyamāne bahuvaktavyaṃ jāyate /
T06abhsubhu:1079: tadyathā daśabhirbalaiścittasyotpādo veditavyaḥ - paricayabalena chandabalena prayogabalena
T06abhsubhu:1088: adhimātreṇa yatheṣṭaṃ sarvāṇi vā vyutkrāmyānulomaṃ pratilomaṃ ca samāpattirveditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:1089: chandabalena dvitīyadhyānalābhī prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpanno yadyākāṃkṣati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ vyutthānacittamāmukhīkarotyatha nā kāṃkṣati kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā /
T06abhsubhu:1091: prayogabalena kāmāvacarasya kuśalasyavānantaraṃ tatprathamato rūpāvacaraṃ cittamutpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:1093: maulasya kuśalasyānantaraṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpannakamityevamādi vistareṇa yāvadbhavāgrāt veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1097: tadvirodhi kleśasaṃprayuktasya punaścittasya hetvādibhiśca turbhirbalaiḥ samudācāro
T06abhsubhu:1100: viṣayabalena yadi rāgādyutpatyanukūlaḥ śubhādinimittaḥ prabhāvotkaṭaviṣaya ābhāsasamāgato bhavati,
T06abhsubhu:1103: pratisaṃdhibalena nava maraṇacittānyātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāni triṣu dhātuṣupratyekaṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /
T06abhsubhu:1104: tatra kāmadhātoścyutvā kāmadhātāveva pratisaṃdhi vadhnataḥ kāmāvacaramātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ maraṇacittaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1106: tathā rūpārūpyadhātubhyāṃ cyutvā tatra vānyatra votpadyamānasya ṣaṭcittāni yojayitavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:1110: āryāṇāmapyavītarāgāṇāṃ maraṇakāle yāvadaspaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāṃ na gacchati tāvadasau tṛṣṇā samudācarati /
T06abhsubhu:1112: vītarāgāṇāṃ tvāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣasya valīyastvānnaivāsau samudācaratyaprahīṇāpi satī /
T06abhsubhu:1120: bodhisattvānāṃ tu praṇidhānabalenopapadyamānānāṃ maraṇacittādikamekāntena sarva kuśalaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1129: savastukaviṣayālaṃbanato dṛṣṭimasmimānaṃ tatsaṃprayuktāṃśca dharmān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāmālaṃbanam /
T06abhsubhu:1139: ālaṃbanapratyaye viniścayaḥ - lakṣaṇato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sthitito 'pi parijñānato 'pi prahāṇato 'pyālavanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:1154: sabhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ kuśalādīni svabhūmikānāṃ ca svabhūmikaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ ca sāsravamanāsravāṇāṃ cānāsravam /
T06abhsubhu:1168: tattvamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā tathatā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cākārāṇāṃ satyāni /
T06abhsubhu:1180: trividhaṃ jñānaṃ vaśitājñānaṃ vipaśyanājñāna nirvikalpajñānaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:1198: śrāvakayānāśrayaparivṛttyā skandhadhātvāyatanālaṃbanebhyo vimokṣo na tu teṣu vibhutvalābhaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1206: paurāṇaṃ sāsravakarma vipākasyetyevamādi sahabhāvādhipatitaḥ cittaṃ caitasānām,
T06abhsubhu:1223: vijñānasahitasya vijñānasādṛśyenendriyasya viṣayeṣu prabandhenotpatteḥ vijñānavṛttisādṛśyārthena tadindriyaṃ sabhāgamityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:1243: duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhātmikā satī svenaiva lakṣaṇena duḥkhaduḥkhatāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1245: sukhāyā vedanāyāstadvedanīyānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena daurmanasyotpādāt tadvipariṇatirvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
T06abhsubhu:1246: tatra cānunayena cittasya vipariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:1263: ālayavijñānāttadanyattu cakṣurādikaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ ca tadvipākrajamityākhyāṃ labhate tato jātamiti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:1287: tatra parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ skandhādīnyadhiṣṭhāyāvidyamāna ātmādisvabhāvo yaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1300: lakṣaṇasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandho rūpaskandhenaiva saṃgṛhīto vistareṇa yāvaddharmāyatanaṃ dharmāyata[ne]naiva /
T06abhsubhu:1303: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1305: avasthāsaṃgraheṇa skandhā ekajātīyā api sukhādyavasthāṃ niyamayya sukhāvasthāḥ sukhāvasthaireva saṃgṛhītā na duḥkhādyavasthaiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1307: yathā skandhā evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni ca /
T06abhsubhu:1308: sahāyasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandhaḥ saha tadāśritairvedanādibhiḥ sahāyairgṛhyamāṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1309: evaṃ vedanādayāpi pratyekaṃ saparivārā gṛhyamāṇāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
T06abhsubhu:1310: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:1315: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1319: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1321: yathāyogamevaṃ dhātavaḥ skandhāyatanarāyatanāni skandhadhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni [iti] vistareṇāvagantavyam //
T06abhsubhu:1326: araṇyasaṃgṛhītā mṛgā iti loke ucyate tathehāpi cakṣurādibhiḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1327: nibandhasaṃgraho yathā rajjvādinā kāṣṭhabhārādikasya tathā kāyena cakṣurādonāmindriyāṇām /
T06abhsubhu:1328: tulyārthasaṃgraho yathā samānasarvaprayojanānāṃ visrambhiṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ parasparaṃ tarthakālaṃbanapravṛttānāṃ saṃprayuktānāmānyonyam /
T06abhsubhu:1329: upādānasaṃgraho yathā svāminā ātmīyataḥ parigrahītādīnā dāsādīnāṃ tathālayavijñānenātmabhāvasya /
T06abhsubhu:1330: avisārasaṃgraho yathā ghaṭenodakasya tathā samādhinā tadanyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānām /
T06abhsubhu:1331: abhisaṃkṣepa[saṃ]graho yathā samudreṇa nadīnāṃ tathā rūpaskandhena cakṣurādonāmiti /
T06abhsubhu:1333: paramāṇudeśe sarveṣāṃ deśināmityekaparamāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpādīnāmavinirbhāgaḥ samānadeśatvena veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1334: paramāṇorūrdhva sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ miśrībhāvaḥ tadyathā kaluṣe pānīye appṛthivīparamāṇūnāṃ paramparam /
T06abhsubhu:1335: deśināmeva samudāyināmanyonyaṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā bhittau mṛtpiṇḍena mṛtpiṇḍāntarasya /
T06abhsubhu:1338: saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaḥ parabhāvena na svabhāvena tadyathā cittaṃ cittāntareṇa na saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1343: sarvatragaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayoga vedanādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sarvāsvavasthāsveṣāṃ vinānyonyamabhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1344: ucitastadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāmityekāntalaukikānāṃ kuśalānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
T06abhsubhu:1347: samanvāgamo lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavattadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1348: bījasamanvāgama iti kāmadhātau jātau bhūtastraidhātukaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ samanvāgata ityavītarāgaṃ pṛthagjanamadhikṛtyaitadvaiditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1349: vītarāgastu tatrordhvaṃ vā jāto yato bhūmervītarāgastadbhūmikairasamanvāgataḥ samanvāgataśca,
T06abhsubhu:1353: yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyasyādhimātrādeḥ kleśasya /
T06abhsubhu:1355: vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ prāyogikānāṃ kuśalānāmiti śrutamayādīnāṃ satyapi bīje tadabhyāsakṛtāṃ tajjanmikīṃ bījapuṣṭimantareṇa saṃmukhīkartumaśakyatvāt
T06abhsubhu:1360: yasyaivaṃ tathatāyāṃ kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ saṃniviṣṭaṃ bhavati tatsati pratipakṣānukūlapratyayalābhe śakyate samuddhātayitum,
T06abhsubhu:1368: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśajanitaḥ karmakleśādhipateya ityābhyāṃ tayoḥ sattvabhājanalokayorduḥkhatvakāraṇaṃ jñāpayati //
T06abhsubhu:1369: api khalu jātirduḥkhamityevamādi pūrvaṃ samasya duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇaṃ vyutpādyādhunā duḥkhasatyamārabhya sūtroktasya nirdeśasyārtha vibhaktumārabhate
T06abhsubhu:1370: jātirduḥkhaṃ saṃvādaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyadukhasvāśrayatāṃ copādāyeti mātuḥ kukṣāvāmapakvāśayayorantarāle
T06abhsubhu:1373: ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti vipariṇatidukhaṃ tridhā kṛtvā //
T06abhsubhu:1385: tatpuna rasallakṣaṇaṃ yathā nāsti sarvadā duḥkhasatyamā[tmā]tmoyasvabhāvamiti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rtho 'nityaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti /
T06abhsubhu:1389: viyogalakṣaṇaṃ tadavastheṣveva vastuṣu svabhāvavaśitvabhraṃśaḥ kvacitparaiḥ svīkaraṇamapi veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1399: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasthānāvasāne lokasaṃniveśe saṃvṛtte tadūrdhvaṃ yānyavaśiṣyante dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasyānāntarāṇi tāni tāsāṃ śīrṣāṇi veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:1402: taireva tu sarvairjāyamānaiḥ saha tāni vimānāni nirvartante cyavamānaiḥ saha (Abhidh-s-bh 51)
T06abhsubhu:1412: tasminnāyatane upapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaṇa upayuktatvādabhāvādvā tatra bhūyo 'nutpattito veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:1422: saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktam - mayā yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyayamaduḥkhāsukhasya sukhasya ca veditasya duḥkha vacane 'bhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1423: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:1424: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate [teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1432: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1436: kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā /
T06abhsubhu:1437: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate /
T06abhsubhu:1443: tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1446: cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādyavasthāsu /
T06abhsubhu:1447: ataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikāriṇaścetaso 'nuvidhānāt kāyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham /
T06abhsubhu:1449: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1450: yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayībhavandṛṣṭaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1456: ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1457: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa /
T06abhsubhu:1464: na hi pratikṣaṇaprakṛtivikāritāmantareṇākasmiko rūpasyānte vikāro yuktaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1469: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti [na] kiṃcidviśeṣaṇamasti /
T06abhsubhu:1476: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti /
T06abhsubhu:1484: itya[nya]trāpi yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra /
T06abhsubhu:1487: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ kriyate
T06abhsubhu:1488: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadevaṃ niḥśarīro 'pi paramāṇurvyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:1490: avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
T06abhsubhu:1493: evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati,
T06abhsubhu:1497: yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām,
T06abhsubhu:1507: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatyantareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayān labhate /
T06abhsubhu:1508: atha na labhate saptāhātpareṇa cyutvā punarantarābhava eva nivartate /
T06abhsubhu:1509: evaṃ yāva[t] saptakṛtvaḥ tataḥ pareṇa ekadā ca vyāvartate yadi tadavasthā syādyatropapattipratya[ya] /
T06abhsubhu:1510: balavanta āmukhībhūtā bhavanti caturthadhyānalābhino 'rhattvābhimānino bhikṣostadbhūmikāntarābhavābhinirvṛttau mokṣāpavādi kamithyādṛṣṭipratilambhānnārakāntarābhavābhinirvṛttivat
T06abhsubhu:1513: sabhāgāṃśca sattvānpaśyati yaiḥ saha pūrva tatkuśalamakuśalaṃ vā caritaṃ bhavati taiḥ saha vartamānamātmānaṃ svapna iva saṃjānīte /
T06abhsubhu:1515: tata ūrdhvamindriyābhinirvṛttiryathā pratītyasamutpāda iti nāmarūpādyānupūrvyā / yathoktam -
T06abhsubhu:1523: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1524: yadyevaṃ kimartha bhagavatā tṛṣṇaiva samudayanirdeśe nirdiṣṭā /
T06abhsubhu:1538: ālayavijñānaṃ viśeṣeṇa saṃskāraduḥkhatāvasthaṃ tatra cātmasaṃmohasukhena tṛṣṇā pravṛttā veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:1549: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti //
T06abhsubhu:1552: sā punaḥ ṣaḍākārā tadyathā vikṣepāpraśāntatā viparyāsāpraśāntatā auddhatyāpraśāntatā styānamiddhāpraśāntatā pramādāpraśāntatālajjāpraśāntatā ca //
T06abhsubhu:1555: tatra cāyo niśomanaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavatīti tasminviṣaye śubhanimittādyudgrāhako rāgādyutpattyanukūlaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1556: avidyā dṛṣṭivicikitsā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanā api santi na punarāsāṃ sā bhūmiḥ sākṣādālaṃbanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā svabhūmiḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1560: na hi parabhūmikān saṃskārānahamityabhiniviśamāno dṛṣṭa iti /
T06abhsubhu:1565: tat parikalpitaṃ tvasyālaṃbanamiti vaktavye tatparikalpastvasyālaṃbanamiti vacanam,
T06abhsubhu:1572: pratigho mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1573: na hi yo yatra vastuni pratihatastena sa unnatiṃ gacchati tadvā saṃtīrayituṃ śaknotīti,
T06abhsubhu:1575: krodhādaya anyonyaṃ na saṃprayujyanta iti viruddhā viruddhairna saṃ[pra]yujyante /
T06abhsubhu:1583: yadyena prakāreṇa yasmin vastuni saṃprayojayati tannirdeśena saṃyojananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1593: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāni saraṇaṃ paryeṣata ityaha mokṣo mama mokṣo muktaśca nityo bhaviṣyāsyucchetsyāmi veti,
T06abhsubhu:1596: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ hitvā satkāyadṛṣṭayā tatpūrvakeṇa ca śīlavratena śuddhipratyayanāt //
T06abhsubhu:1598: bāhyena hi bandhanena baddho dvayaṃ na labhate - gantuṃ ca na labhate,
T06abhsubhu:1603: mithyā mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca santīrayantīti yathākramaṃ tisṛbhirdṛṣṭibhirdvābhyāṃ ca parāmarśābhyāṃ yathā saṃyojaneṣūktamiti //
T06abhsubhu:1605: ṣaḍ rāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaścaitasikaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ krodhādiko veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1606: kuśalapakṣāntarāyāya yogināṃ punaḥpunarudvegena cittaṃ paryavanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
T06abhsubhu:1607: kuśalapakṣaḥ punaryathākālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittabhāvanā tatsaṃniśrayaśca brahmacaryādiśuddhisaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam /
T06abhsubhu:1626: abhidhyādayaḥ kāyagranthā iti na rūpakāyasyaite granthā veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi samāhitacittasvabhāvasya kāyasya parigranthārthena granthāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1627: pṛthagdṛṣṭisaṃniśrayeṇedameva satyaṃ moghamanyadityabhiniviśya jñeyaṃ saṃtīrayatāmayoniśo jñeyasaṃtīraṇahetoḥ cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
T06abhsubhu:1630: kuśalapakṣasyāsaṃprakhyānāya cittaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni kuśalapravṛtterantarāyaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1643: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre jātijarāmaraṇayogena nidhnantīti nighāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1651: mithyādharmābhiniveśahetoḥ viparītadarśino mohena duścaritaṃ caranti yājñikādaya iti //
T06abhsubhu:1654: ayoniśonimittamanuvyañjanaṃ ca grāhayitvā kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1655: rūpādike vastuni ratyadhyavasānaṃ kārayitvā tadvipariṇāme śokādibhiḥ sattvānāyāsantītyu pāyāsāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1665: rāgo viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyo darśanaprahātavyaśca yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:1666: śubhatāmātrālaṃbanatvādrāgasya yo 'pi sattveṣu rāgaḥ so 'pi viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1667: evaṃ pratikūlamātrālaṃbanatvāt pratighasya sattveṣvapi pravartamāno viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1668: mānaḥ sattveṣu dṛṣṭau ca [vi]pratipannaḥ hīnādasmi śreyānityevamādyākārapravṛttatvātsatveṣu vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1670: śīlavrataparāmarśādiḥ dṛṣṭau vipratipannaḥ dṛṣṭidoṣeṇaiva śīlavratasya śuddhitaḥ parāmarśanāt /
T06abhsubhu:1675: nirodhe mārge cottrāsasaṃjananato vipratipannāḥ kleśavaśātsaṃsāre 'bhiratasya vyavadānataḥ prapātasaṃjñātrāsāt /
T06abhsubhu:1676: viparītakalpanataśca nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannā draṣṭavyāḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1685: sarva upekṣayā pūrvavat sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1694: yā parivṛttāśrayasya parivṛttivijñānāśritā cittatuṣṭiḥ cittaudvilyaṃ cittaharṣaḥ cittakalpatā sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06abhsubhu:1696: yatparivṛttāśrayasyālayavijñānāśrita āśrayānugrahata āśrayahlādaḥ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamiti /
T06abhsubhu:1698: sukhā vedanā prathamadvitīyayordhyānayorutpadyamānā yena cittacaitakalāpena saṃprayujyate taṃ ca harṣākāreṇa prīṇayati,
T06abhsubhu:1700: atastadubhayakṛtyakaratvādubhayathaivāsyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ ceti /
T06abhsubhu:1701: tasmāttayā saṃprayujyamāno mānaḥ sukhena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyata ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:1702: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātau daurmanasyena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1708: rūpadhātau vicikitsottaradhyāyināmapi prītisukhaṃ samādhivalādhānenānuvartata eveti tatra sukhasaumanasyābhyāmapi saṃprayujyate //
T06abhsubhu:1709: āveṇikāyā apyavidyāyā eṣa eva nayo draṣṭavyaḥ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayogāsaṃprayogamārabhya //
T06abhsubhu:1717: kāmadhatau daśa dukhadarśanaprahātavyā iti ye tatra tannidānapadasthānato vipratipannāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1718: evaṃ samudayādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vipratipannāstaddarśanaprahātavyā iti veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1727: tvasti me eṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣvasmīti māno 'smīti chando 'smītyanuśayo 'prahīṇo
T06abhsubhu:1729: ” yathā kliṣṭasya dhātrīcailasyoṣādibhiḥ sudhautasya nirmalasyāpi satastadadhivāsanākṛtaṃ
T06abhsubhu:1734: yayā nirvāṇāt pratyudāvartate mānasaṃ paritrasanamupādāyātha kastarhi me ātmeti /
T06abhsubhu:1737: svabhāvaparijñānaṃ kleśa eṣa utpannaḥ cittasaṃkleśātmaka iti /
T06abhsubhu:1740: tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ parijñāyotpannaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1744: yadi sarvadharmā anātmana iti nairātmyajñānenaiva kleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavatyanityādyākārāḥ kimarthamupadiśyante /
T06abhsubhu:1757: etāni ca trīṇyānuttaryāṇi yathākramaṃ darśanabhāvanāniṣṭhāmārgānadhikṛtya veditavyāni //
T06abhsubhu:1759: kāritrakarma pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhāraṇādi yadvā yasya svalakṣaṇakṛtyam /
T06abhsubhu:1764: asmiṃstvarthe yadbhūyasyā vyavasā karmābhipretamiti prāptikāritrakarmaṇorapi saṃbhavāt //
T06abhsubhu:1765: kāyādikarma karmapathā iti sūtrānusāreṇa yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśo veditavyaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:1768: prāṇātipātādīnāṃ vastu sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā yathāyogaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya prāṇātipātādayaḥ pravartante /
T06abhsubhu:1772: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tena tena prayogeṇa tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ paripūraṇaṃ tatkālamūrdhvakālaṃ vā //
T06abhsubhu:1777: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tasya prāṇinastena prayogeṇānantaraṃ praścādvā maraṇam //
T06abhsubhu:1778: adattādānādonāṃ vastu ca niṣṭhāgamanaṃ ca nirdhekṣyāmaḥ /
