T06abhsubhu:2315: kutaḥ punaretat jñāyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane āryamārgo nāstīti /
T06abhsubhu:2320: pūrvotpāditāyāḥ paścātsaṃmukhobhāvo manuṣyeṣu vā tasminneva janmani rūpadhātau vā upapadya /
T06abhsubhu:2323: ata evātra catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati - yo rūpavītarāgaḥ sarvaḥ sa ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā,
T06abhsubhu:2325: vā ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā sarvaḥ sa rūpavītarāga iti /
T06abhsubhu:2327: dvitīyā koṭiḥ - caturthadhyānalābhī ārya āryopapattyānarthī prahāṇamārgaṃ nirākṛtya viśeṣamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
T06abhsubhu:2328: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ - sa eva vairāgyārthī prahāṇamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
T06abhsubhu:2331: śāntena vihāreṇa vihartukāmā āryā manuṣyeṣvenāmabhinirhṛtya saṃmukhīkurvanti /
T06abhsubhu:2332: ārūpyeṣu tūpapannāste 'prayatnenaiva vaipākikaiḥ paramaśāntaiḥ vimokṣavihārairviharantītyatastatsaṃmukhīkaraṇārthaṃ na punaḥ prayatnamārabhanta iti //
T06abhsubhu:2333: mṛdumadhyādhimātro mārgaḥ pratyekaṃ punaḥ mṛdvādibhistribhiḥ prakārairbhittvā navaprakāro vyavasthāpyate,
T06abhsubhu:2335: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate /
T06abhsubhu:2336: sa hyatyarthaḥ vipannahrīvyapannāpyālajjinaḥ saṃtāne samudācarati sūpalakṣaścāsau suparicchedastasmādasau sthūlamalavadalpenāpi pratipakṣeṇāpanīyate
T06abhsubhu:2337: yastvayaṃ duṣparicchedasamudācāraḥ sūkṣmalīnaḥ saṃtāne mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ sūkṣmamalavanmahatā
T06abhsubhu:2340: dauṣṭhulyāṅgasyāpagamātkrameṇāśrayaḥ parivartate sa bhāvanāmārge prayogamārge ityucyate //
T06abhsubhu:2341: yasya tvanantaraṃ tatprakārakleśajātitatpakṣadauṣṭhulyāvaśeṣāpagamāttena dauṣṭhulyena nirdauṭhulya āśrayaḥ parivartate sa ānantaryamārgaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2346: pūrvacintitādhigatadharmapratyavekṣaṇāvihāreṇa vā viharataḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya yo mārgaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2347: punarabhijñādīn vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharatastairvā viharato yo mārgaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2348: ityevaṃ bhāvanāmārga vistareṇa nirdiśya tadanuṣaṃgeṇa mārgabhāvanā varṇyate /
T06abhsubhu:2358: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāṃ sthāpayati[sā]dhāsanā pratilambhabhāvanā,
T06abhsubhu:2363: punaḥ pratipakṣasya vidūṣaṇādikaḥ caturvidhaḥ prabhedo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2406: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam - ālambanataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyato bhāvanāto bhāvanāphalataśca //
T06abhsubhu:2407: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2410: bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā upalabdhalakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ
T06abhsubhu:2411: śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata āditaḥ samyaktadvastulakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamevaṃ
T06abhsubhu:2425: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
T06abhsubhu:2427: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo 'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā /
T06abhsubhu:2434: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam /
T06abhsubhu:2446: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prasrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:2450: nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:2463: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2464: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati, (Abhidh-s-bh 87)
T06abhsubhu:2465: auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2474: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvreṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:2476: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate /
T06abhsubhu:2477: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūlapariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām
T06abhsubhu:2478: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2479: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:2480: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipannadhigacchatītyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2487: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate /
T06abhsubhu:2503: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando 'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
T06abhsubhu:2507: vivṛtena cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me 'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti /
T06abhsubhu:2511: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya //
T06abhsubhu:2514: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃbanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam
T06abhsubhu:2533: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyālaṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā
T06abhsubhu:2534: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2535: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃbamānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam /
T06abhsubhu:2542: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
T06abhsubhu:2551: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagājīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhiriti
T06abhsubhu:2561: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt /
T06abhsubhu:2566: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃbane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmīkaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā /
T06abhsubhu:2569: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam /
T06abhsubhu:2575: tatra caritaviśodhanamālaṃbanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā (Abhidh-s-bh 91)
T06abhsubhu:2579: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya /
T06abhsubhu:2580: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
T06abhsubhu:2581: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhiṃ niśritya paścāttathāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsāmāpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:2585: śrutodgrahaṇamukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe /
T06abhsubhu:2587: ajñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
T06abhsubhu:2606: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmābhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti /
T06abhsubhu:2630: yathoktaṃ - “tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdheḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2631: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
T06abhsubhu:2632: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi“ti //
T06abhsubhu:2634: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt /
T06abhsubhu:2638: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti //
T06abhsubhu:2643: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ laukiko mārgo 'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sāvaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:2644: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:2646: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣayajñānametaduktaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:2647: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti //
T06abhsubhu:2648: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti
T06abhsubhu:2664: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante /
T06abhsubhu:2673: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06abhsubhu:2683: bhāvagamyo 'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:2689: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt /
T06abhsubhu:2692: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
T06abhsubhu:2696: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi //
T06abhsubhu:2697: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
T06abhsubhu:2724: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante,
T06abhsubhu:2734: abhidharmaṃ niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
T06abhsubhu:2746: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayoranyataropaniṣadbhavati /
T06abhsubhu:2747: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:2748: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti //
T06abhsubhu:2749: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2755: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā,
T06abhsubhu:2758: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo 'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt /
T06abhsubhu:2765: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
T06abhsubhu:2767: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2770: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam /
T06abhsubhu:2774: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2783: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
T06abhsubhu:2785: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:2801: udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
T06abhsubhu:2802: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena /
T06abhsubhu:2805: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñaptisattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇamiti yā vicāraṇā /
T06abhsubhu:2806: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathāpariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2810: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
T06abhsubhu:2812: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
T06abhsubhu:2817: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2825: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna
T06abhsubhu:2829: niśritya dhyāyati tattasmātsamāhitāccittādananyaditi saṃpaśyaṃstasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāraṃ svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati
T06abhsubhu:2830: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate /
T06abhsubhu:2831: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate /
T06abhsubhu:2833: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanniti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2836: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:2840: ca gṛhṇātītyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:2850: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
T06abhsubhu:2852: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante /
T06abhsubhu:2853: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:2854: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
T06abhsubhu:2855: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
T06abhsubhu:2856: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:2858: punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
T06abhsubhu:2867: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā //
T06abhsubhu:2901: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
T06abhsubhu:2902: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2907: kāyavāṅmanaskarmasvabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2909: śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2911: prajñāpāramitā[yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2913: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2914: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:2918: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T06abhsubhu:2922: bodhisattvo mahāntamapi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:2923: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:2927: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti //
T06abhsubhu:2974: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti //
T06abhsubhu:2979: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
T06abhsubhu:2986: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2987: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2990: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2999: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
T06abhsubhu:3007: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena /
T06abhsubhu:3016: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
T06abhsubhu:3020: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3021: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
T06abhsubhu:3023: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi /
T06abhsubhu:3024: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3027: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:3028: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3029: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
T06abhsubhu:3031: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3032: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
T06abhsubhu:3033: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3034: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3036: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3041: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
T06abhsubhu:3043: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti /
T06abhsubhu:3044: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattva[sya] śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmatṛptāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyām /
T06abhsubhu:3045: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
T06abhsubhu:3046: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3047: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
T06abhsubhu:3048: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:3049: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3050: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
T06abhsubhu:3052: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3053: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa (Abhidh-s-bh 108)
T06abhsubhu:3055: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3056: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3058: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3063: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
T06abhsubhu:3064: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
T06abhsubhu:3084: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3085: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3086: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3089: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3090: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
T06abhsubhu:3091: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca //
T06abhsubhu:3094: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
T06abhsubhu:3098: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3100: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
T06abhsubhu:3105: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
T06abhsubhu:3113: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3127: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3130: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3140: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3142: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
T06abhsubhu:3143: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3149: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipapatyamavyābādhyātmabhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3157: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:3159: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:3160: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:3161: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:3162: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā //
T06abhsubhu:3165: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca /
T06abhsubhu:3167: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
T06abhsubhu:3168: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
T06abhsubhu:3176: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayāsaṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:3181: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3184: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3186: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:3192: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3193: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
T06abhsubhu:3196: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
T06abhsubhu:3198: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
T06abhsubhu:3199: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante
T06abhsubhu:3202: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ
T06abhsubhu:3203: yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda
T06abhsubhu:3205: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3206: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
T06abhsubhu:3208: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 113) tathatā /
T06abhsubhu:3210: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
T06abhsubhu:3211: ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti /
T06abhsubhu:3212: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
T06abhsubhu:3213: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3215: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
T06abhsubhu:3217: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
T06abhsubhu:3218: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
T06abhsubhu:3219: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca /
T06abhsubhu:3220: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
T06abhsubhu:3223: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3224: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
T06abhsubhu:3226: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3227: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
T06abhsubhu:3250: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
T06abhsubhu:3256: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3258: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ
T06abhsubhu:3259: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3260: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3261: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3262: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3263: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3265: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve 'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti /
T06abhsubhu:3266: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī (Abhidh-s-bh 115)
T06abhsubhu:3269: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
T06abhsubhu:3270: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
T06abhsubhu:3272: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi,
T06abhsubhu:3274: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te 'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya /
T06abhsubhu:3277: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha /
T06abhsubhu:3279: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham //
T06abhsubhu:3290: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām // iti /
T06abhsubhu:3292: vikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike
T06abhsubhu:3293: viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3294: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3296: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prasrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya drāvaṇam,
T06abhsubhu:3303: daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmāvuttarāduttaratara niṣyandavāsanādhānayogena
T06abhsubhu:3305: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:3308: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayānadharmaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3315: rūpādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ bahudhābhinnalakṣaṇasaṃjñānāmekayā sāmudāyikyā sattvaprajñaptyākṛcchreṇa ehi yāhi ityevamādisaṃvyavaharaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3317: na hi loke dharmamātrasaṃjñābhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāro nirūḍhaḥ kiṃtarhi prāyeṇa sattvasaṃjñayā /
T06abhsubhu:3320: pratītyasamutpādadharmatāyāma kovidāḥ sahasāditaḥ sarvathā sattvābhāvaṃ śrutvottrasyeyuriti /
T06abhsubhu:3322: itarathā hi sattvaprajñaptimantareṇa saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇamātradeśanāyāṃ satyāmamuṣmin saṃtāne 'mī doṣāḥ prahīṇā amī vā guṇā utpannā iti na śakyate vijñātumiti //
T06abhsubhu:3338: vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratyalabhata ityaṣṭābhyāṃ bhūmāvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhata ityarthaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3339: asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhārādayo mokṣabhāgīyānāṃ ca mṛdumadhyādhi mātratayā nirvedhabhāgīyotpādanaṃ satyābhisamayaṃ ca pratiniyatāniyatatajjanmakālikatvādyathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3347: api jātisahasrāṇi nāsau gacchati durgatim // iti //
T06abhsubhu:3357: yadadhimātraṃ satyaprativedhāya tatraiva janmani saṃvartate tatprātivedhikam /
T06abhsubhu:3359: pariṇāmyate tacca pratyekabuddhānāmanācāryakābhisaṃbodhāya janmāntare pariṇamati tadanyapāriṇāmikam /
T06abhsubhu:3364: aṣṭau vimokṣā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādayaḥ paścānnirdekṣyante /
T06abhsubhu:3367: srotāpattiphalapratipannaka ekāsanikaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamārabhya yāvadādyaṃ phalaṃ na prāpnoti //
T06abhsubhu:3370: yastu pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarān bhāvanāprahātavyān ṣaṭprakārān prahāya
T06abhsubhu:3371: yatra yo vītarāgo bhavan paścātsamyaktvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe
T06abhsubhu:3373: navāpi prakārān prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavan yo niyāmamavakrāmati so 'nāgāmyeva bhavati //
T06abhsubhu:3377: uccalito 'pi kathaṃcinmokṣaṃ prati śīlavrataparāmarśena vicikitsayā cāsanmārgābhiniveśātsanmārgasaṃśayanācca mithyā niryāti samyaktvamaniryāti
T06abhsubhu:3384: sakṛdā[gā]miphalapratipannakaḥ darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarasya yāvanmadhyamadhyasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3385: sakṛdāgāmī madhyamṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇa mārga parisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3388: anāgāmī navamasya mṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇāya mārgaparisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3389: sarvakāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇe 'pi pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmivacanaṃ sūtre eṣāṃ gatidhātvavarakāraṇatvena prādhānyāt /
T06abhsubhu:3399: kulaṃ kulaḥ kulaḥ srotāpanna eva sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā niyamena dvau bhavau saṃsṛtya parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3400: ekavīcikaḥ sakṛdāgāmyevānāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣvevaikaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsṛtyaṃ parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3403: sati yenānuśayamātreṇa maraṇādūrdhva skandhānabhinirvartayan tadavaśeṣe satyantarābhavamabhinirvartya
T06abhsubhu:3411: bhavāgragaścaturthasya dhyānasyāvyavakīrṇabhāvitvāt kevalaṃ śuddhāvāsān parihṛtya tathaiva yāvadbhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3412: vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya mṛdvādipañcaprakārabhāvitatvādyathākramaṃ pañcasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattirveditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:3423: sattvaparipācanārthaṃ kāmadhātāvapi bodhisattva upapadyata iti veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3426: adhimukticārī bodhisattvagotre vyavasthita ādito mahābodhiprasthānamupādāya yāvatpramuditāṃ bhūmiṃ na praviśati,
T06abhsubhu:3438: evaṃ yāvan mṛdumṛdūn darśanaprahātavyān na tu laukikamārgavadbhūmiprakārabhedena pṛthakpṛthagityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3441: bhāgaṃ karotyekaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ puñjamekaṃ rāśiṃ karotyekaṃ kṛtvātaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate sarvametadanityaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhamiti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3447: sa dṛṣṭe dharme yadyājñāṃ tārāgayati sarvato niḥśeṣamavītarāgatvātpraṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātāvupapadyate kṣipraparinirvāṇārtham //
T06abhsubhu:3449: tatra dharmābhisamayaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu paratoghoṣamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā dhimātrasyādhimuktiprasādasya paścimamokṣabhāgīyasaṃgṛhītasya pratilambhaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3453: sā punardharmanidhyānakṣāntistrividhena yoniśomanaskāreṇa prabhāvitā adhimātramṛdunā tajjanmakāleṣūṣmagateṣu,
T06abhsubhu:3457: tatra punaḥ satyavyavasthāpanānyabhisamayāntikāni saṃvṛtijñānāni pratilambhato lokottarajñānādhipatyena
T06abhsubhu:3458: tadabījapoṣaṇānna tu sammukhīkaroti ṣoḍaśānāṃ darśanamārgacittakṣaṇānāṃ nirantaratvena
T06abhsubhu:3463: supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃgha ityevamavetya niścityāryaśrāvakasya buddhādiṣu prasādaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3465: pratyevaṃ niścayaḥ pravarttate kṣoṇā me narakāḥ ityevamādiḥ so 'samudācārābhisamayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3466: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ sarvadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdhirityevamādiryathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārgo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3467: eta eva saptābhisamayāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ paratoghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3469: bodhisattvābhisamaya eṣu saptasvabhisamayeṣu bodhisattvasya yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavinayopāyakauśalyārthaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 123)
T06abhsubhu:3471: api khalu tatprathamato bodhisattvasya bhūmipraveśābhisamaya ityucyate //
T06abhsubhu:3472: etaṃ cābhisamaya niśrityocyate - śrāvakābhisamayādbodhisattvābhisamasya kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ ālaṃbanaviśeṣato vaipulyālaṃbanatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3474: prativedhaviśeṣataḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyādhipateyadharmaprayogavedhato lokottareṇa jñānena tadubhayaprativedhāt abhyupagamaviśeṣataḥ svātmasamatayā sarvasattvābhyupagamāt /
T06abhsubhu:3486: bhogaviśeṣaḥ sadā bodhisattveḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu vicitradharmasaṃbhogāt /
T06abhsubhu:3487: kamaviśeṣo yathārhaṃ nirmāṇeḥ samantādanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānāditi /
T06abhsubhu:3490: miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ suviśuddhadharmadhātvekarasatayā tadāśritāsu sarvākāravarajñatāsu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sāmarthyāt /
T06abhsubhu:3493: abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanopāyaviśeṣato daśasu dikṣu yathāyogaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu yāvadaparāntaṃ punaḥpunarbuddhotpādādi saṃdarśanena sarvavineyajanaparipācanavimocanāt
T06abhsubhu:3498: apāyaparitrāṇaṃ darśanamārgotpādanena durgatisamatikramaṇāt satkāyaparitrāṇamarhattvasākṣātkaraṇena traidhātukavi mokṣāṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3500: vaiśaṃṣikaguṇā āryaśrāvakairbhāvanāmārge vābhinirhriyante 'śaikṣamārge vetyata eṣāṃ pṛṣṭhaniṣṭhābhisamayābhyāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3501: te punarmaitryādayo yathāsūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ śrāvakayāne mahāyāne ca tathaiva veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3502: teṣāṃ cāya samāsena pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ lakṣaṇanirdeśo veditavyaḥ - niśrayata ālaṃbanata ākārataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyataśca //
T06abhsubhu:3507: cittacaitasikāḥ sahāyā ityevaṃ karuṇādiṣu yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3508: upekṣayā sukhādiṣu sattveṣvanunayādyabhyupekṣaṇamaho vata saṃkleśādvimucyerannityayamākāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3511: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ prathamo vimokṣa iti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3513: svātmanyā rūpyasamāpattisaṃniśrayeṇa rūpasaṃjñāyā abhibhāvanādrūpasaṃjñāsaṃniveśanādvā draṣṭavyāni rūpasaṃjñāsaṃmukhī karaṇādityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3522: (Abhidh-s-bh 125) tathāhi śubhāni rūpāṇyapekṣya tadanyeṣvaśubhānīti bhavatyaśubhāni vāpekṣya śubhānīti nānapekṣyaikajātīyānāmeva darśane śubhāśubhatābuddhyabhāvāt
T06abhsubhu:3524: śubhasaṃmatasyāpi tvaṅmātrasya keśādiṣaṭtriśadaśucidravyāntarabhāvādityevamanyonyaṃ sarvarūpāṇi miśrayitvā śubhataikarasākārayā saṃjñayā vimucyate
T06abhsubhu:3525: tasyaivaṃ rūpādivimokṣavibhutvalābhinaḥ śubhāśubhanirmāṇāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate tatra ca saṃkleśotpattyāvaraṇam /
T06abhsubhu:3529: ākāśānantyāyatanādīni catvāryāryaśrāvakasya yānyanāśravānukūlāni śuddhāni tāni vimokṣakākhyāṃ labhante,
T06abhsubhu:3531: ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārūpyāsteṣvasaktiḥ pariśuddhiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3542: ata eva cānayoḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti vacanaṃ nānyeṣu rūpyarūpivimokṣāvaraṇāśeṣaprahāṇādyathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:3544: aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni tatra adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇī tāni,
T06abhsubhu:3546: rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathā ca saṃjñī bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3548: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni vistareṇa yāvattayā ca saṃjñī bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3550: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyetasmādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete /
T06abhsubhu:3551: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni vistareṇa yāvattathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3553: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi yathā tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3555: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyeta smādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete /
T06abhsubhu:3556: evaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ catvāryabhibhvāyatanāni veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:3557: adhyātma[ma]rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni /
T06abhsubhu:3558: tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇa nīlanidarśanaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3559: nīlanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni yāvannīlanirbhāsāni
T06abhsubhu:3560: tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyābhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3562: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni yāvatpītanirbhāsāni /
T06abhsubhu:3563: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇamiti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3565: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni yāvallohitanirbhāsāni /
T06abhsubhu:3566: tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohita[varṇa]miti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3569: tadyathā uṣasi tārakāyā varṇaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastramavadātamavadātavarṇamavadātanidarśanamavadātanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī
T06abhsubhu:3571: tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3573: etāni catvāri śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyetasmādvimokṣādabhinirhriyate //
T06abhsubhu:3585: tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatītyabhibhūte nābhibhūte vā tannirabhimānasaṃjñitāmupādāya /
T06abhsubhu:3597: ityevaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭānte 'pi tadyathomakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇamityevamādinirdeśa upapanno bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3602: tatpunaryathā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādi nirdeśānusāreṇa draṣṭavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3603: evamabhibhvāyatanairālaṃbanaṃ vaśe vartayitvā kṛtsnāyatanaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ spharati samantānantā paryantaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3605: tadyathā pṛthivīkṛtsnamapkṛtsnaṃ tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnamavadātakṛtsnamākāśānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3606: kṛtsnāyataneṣu pṛthivyādīni yadi na vyavasthāpyeran tenāśrayamahābhūtairvinā tadupādāyarūpaṃ nīlādiakaṃ spharituṃ na śakyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3607: tasyāśrayasya rūpasya spharaṇasamṛddhimupādāyaiṣāṃ kṛtsneṣu vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3612: araṇā vihārī yeṣāṃ sattvānāmābhāsaṃ gantukāmo bhavati teṣāmātmani (Abhidh-s-bh 128)
T06abhsubhu:3614: tathā tatsamīpamupasaṃkrāmati na vā yathā te tatrānunayapratidherṣyāmātsaryādikaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3616: ata idamucyate 'raṇā dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhāviti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3618: tatra tatra mānasaṃ praṇidhāyedaṃ jānīyāmiti dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
T06abhsubhu:3626: dharmanirvacane ceti tadyathā lujyate pralujyate tasmāllokaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3628: pratibhānapratisaṃviddharmaprabhedeṣviti dravyasantaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ saṃvṛtisantaḥ paramārthasanta ityevamādiṣu //
T06abhsubhu:3629: ṛddhayabhijñā vicitraddhivikuvitasamṛddhāviti tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādau /
T06abhsubhu:3633: cyutyutpādābhijñā divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyavamānānāmupapadyamānānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3634: durvarṇānāṃ sugatimapi gacchatāṃ durgatimapyaparāntamārabhya cyutyupapādasaṃdarśanasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3637: lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni yatsamādhiprajñādhipatyena buddhā bhagavanto dvātriṃśatā lakṣaṇairaśītyānuvyañjanaiḥ vibhrājamānaṃ rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayanti vineyānām /
T06abhsubhu:3642: catasraḥ sarvakārāḥ pariśuddhayo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānām /
T06abhsubhu:3656: catvāri vaiśāradyāni - samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sata ime te dharmā anabhisaṃbuddhā
T06abhsubhu:3657: ityatra māṃ kaścicchramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā sahadharmeṇa codayedvā smārayedvā
T06abhsubhu:3658: nimittamapi na samanupaśyāmyetacca nimitta[ma]samanupaśyan kṣemaprāptaśca vaiśāradyaprāptaścodāramārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāmi,
T06abhsubhu:3661: kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:3662: ye vā punarme śrāvakā[ṇā]mantarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tān pratiṣevamānasya nālamantarāyāteti (Abhidh-s-bh 130)
T06abhsubhu:3663: yo vā punarme śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ākhyāta āryonairyāṇiko nairvedhikaḥ sa vata
T06abhsubhu:3664: na samyaṅniryāti tatkarasya samyagduḥ[kha]kṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai ityatra māṃ
T06abhsubhu:3665: kaścit śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yāvatsiṃhanādaṃ nadāmīti vistareṇaikaikasmin vaktavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3666: tānyetāni vaiśāradyāni svārthaṃ parārthaṃ cārabhya veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:3669: tatrābhisaṃbodhivaiśāradyaṃ jñānātmakaṃ svārthamevārabhya sarvākāraṃ mayā saprabhedaparyantaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3674: sarvākārā antarāyikā dharmāḥ sarve sāṃkleśikāḥ vipakṣadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3675: sarvākāro nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ prayogamārgamārabhya yāvanniṣṭhāmārgo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3677: iha śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatyanukampakaḥ kāruṇiko 'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāyamānaḥ - idaṃ vo bhikṣavo hitāya idaṃ sukhāya idaṃ hitasukhāyeti
T06abhsubhu:3678: tasya te śrāvakāḥ śuśrūṣante śrotramavadadhatyājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
T06abhsubhu:3679: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvamupekṣakastatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan /
T06abhsubhu:3682: punaraparaṃ śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati yāvadidaṃ hitasukhāya /
T06abhsubhu:3683: tasya te śrāvakā na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
T06abhsubhu:3684: tatra tathāgatasya nāghāto bhavati nākṣāntirnāpratyayo na cetaso 'nabhirāddhirupekṣakastatreti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3686: tṛtīye 'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ - asyaike śrāvakāḥ śuśrūṣante yāvatpratipadyante dharmasyānudharmameke na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam
T06abhsubhu:3687: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndo bhavati yāvaccetaso nābhirāddhiriti /
T06abhsubhu:3692: nāsti tathāgatasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccinme pare vi[jā]nīyuriti /
T06abhsubhu:3694: ebhirnirvaktavyatayā nirāśaṅkatvātsvayaṃ śāstuvineyajanaparikarṣaṇamārabhya yatheṣṭaṃ nigṛhya prasajyāvavādānuśāsanīprayogaḥ samṛddhayatīti veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3695: asaṃmoṣadharmatā sarvavineyakāryamārabhya yathāvatkṛtasya bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3696: vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvajñasya sataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaśeṣasūcakānāṃ kāyavākceṣṭitānāmasamudācārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3697: mahākaruṇā traidhātukāvacareṣu sarvasattveṣu nirantarasarvaprakāraduḥkhālaṃbana karuṇāvihārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3717: tadyathā arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravaḥ grāmaṃ piṇḍāya carannekadā caṇḍena hastinā sārgha samāgacchati /
T06abhsubhu:3724: araṇye vā punamārgaṃ hitvā kumārgeṇa gacchati /
T06abhsubhu:3725: corairvā taskarairvā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati siṃhairvyāghrairvāparavṛkairvā ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ skhalitamarhatastathāgatasya sarveṇa sarva nāsti /
T06abhsubhu:3731: ityevaṃbhāgīyamarhato ravitaṃ tathāgatasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāsti /
T06abhsubhu:3735: punaraparamarhannekāntenopadhā ca pratikramaṇasaṃjñī bhavati nirupadhike ca nirvāṇe śāntasaṃjñī /
T06abhsubhu:3736: tathāgatasya upadhau nirvāṇe ca nānātvasaṃjñā nāsti,
T06abhsubhu:3740: punaraparamarhan jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhyāprāptaparihāṇyā chandenāpi parihīyate vīrye ṇāpismṛtyā samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanenāpi parihīyate /
T06abhsubhu:3745: tathāgatasya trayāṇāmapi karmaṇāṃ jñānapūrvagamatvājjñānānuparivartitvācca nāstyavyākṛtaṃ karma tatra jñānasamutthāpanatāmupādāya jñānapūrvagamam
T06abhsubhu:3747: punaraparamarhan traiyadhvikaṃ jñeyavastu na cābhogamātrātpratipadyate yenāsya saktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3748: na ca sarvaṃ pratipadyate yenāsya pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3754: tatra nāsti muṣitasmṛtiḥ nāstyasamānitaṃ cittaṃ nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣetyetaccatuṣṭayaṃ manaskarmapariśuddhimadhikṛtya veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3755: nāsti chandaparihāṇiryāvannāsti vimuktijñānadarśanaparihāṇiriti sāśrayāṇāṃ saphalānāṃ tathāgatendriyāṇāmaprāptyaparihāṇisamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3759: sarvaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma jñānapūrvagamaṃ jñānānuvartītyete trayo 'sādhāraṇakarmacārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3763: abhinirhāropāyaḥ punaryathāvyavasthānaṃ manaskārabahulīkāratā yathādeśanaṃ samāhitasya cittasya punaḥpunastatra dhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3764: tadyathāpramāṇānyabhinirhartukāmo maṃtrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsapatnenetyevamādikāṃ deśanāṃ dhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa bhāvayan manasikurvan bahulīkaroti,
T06abhsubhu:3765: evamabhijñādīnabhi nirhartukāma eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādikaṃ vyavasthānaṃ manasikurvan bahulīkarotīti yojayitavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3767: svakāritrapratyupasthānāśca yairāryo yathāyogaṃ vipakṣaprahāṇādikaṃ karma karoti,
T06abhsubhu:3769: tatrāpramāṇaivipakṣaṃ prajahātīti yathākramaṃ vyāpādaṃ vihiṃsāmaratimanunayapratighau ca /
T06abhsubhu:3773: ata eva sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate,
T06abhsubhu:3794: baleṣu dvābhyāṃ balābhyāmabhyudayamārga deśayati śeṣairniḥśreyasamārgame tāvacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ karaṇīyam /
T06abhsubhu:3795: tatra sthānāsthānajñānabalena bhagavannirhetuko 'bhyudayaḥ prakṛtīśvarādihetuko vetyevamahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratikṣipati /
T06abhsubhu:3805: āsravakṣayajñānabalena niḥsaraṇaṃ ca sarvasmāttraidhātukādanupraviśati yato yathāvanmokṣamārga deśayati //
T06abhsubhu:3808: sthānāsthāne yāvadāsravakṣaya iti sarvatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭasya praśnavyākaraṇavyāghātācca //
T06abhsubhu:3817: vāsanāsamudghātena niḥkleśaḥ kleśapratirūpāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na darśayati yathārhan bhikṣuḥ skhalitādikaṃ darśayati //
T06abhsubhu:3819: ko hīyate kaḥ parihīyata ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ pratyavekṣaṇāt //
T06abhsubhu:3824: tatra tatra vineyasaṃśayacchedanārtha deśitānāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ saṃgītikārairanukrameṇa saṃjñāpanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3825: (Abhidh-s-bh 136) dharmanetrīṃ nisrityāparipakvāḥ sattvāḥ paripacyante paripakvāśca vimucyante //
T06abhsubhu:3826: viśiṣṭamārgalābhe hīnamārgavihānistadyathā phalasaṃgṛhītamārgalābhe pratipannakamārgo vihīna ityucyate,
T06abhsubhu:3832: ata eva bodhisattvā akṣayakuśalamūlā akṣayaguṇā ityucyante tadyathākṣamiti [sūtre] 'kṣayatānirdiṣṭeti //
T06abhsubhu:3834: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ praśnānāṃ kīdṛśaḥ punaḥ praśno 'rthopasaṃhitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3841: bhrāntyāśrayo yasminnāryajñā nagocare saṃskāranimittamātre 'bhūtaparikalpātmake sati bālānāṃ so 'bhiniveśaḥ pravartate /
T06abhsubhu:3852: dānapāramitāṃ yāvat sarvākāravarajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāsyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamiti vacanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3853: kṣiprābhijñatākauśalyaṃ ṣaṭkṛtvā rātridivasaṃ pāpapratideśanā puṇyānumodanā buddhādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlapariṇāmanā ca yathākra[ma]māryamaitreyaparipṛcchāyām
T06abhsubhu:3854: dharmānupacchedakauśalyaṃ cāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇatayā punaḥpanaranuparatamatyantaṃ ca samantāllokadhātuṣu yathāvineyaṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāsaṃdarśanāditi
T06abhsubhu:3871: sa eṣa daśavidho vikalpaḥ prajñāpāramitādinirdeśamadhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3872: yathoktam iha śāriputra bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva san bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati /
T06abhsubhu:3878: tathāhi nāma svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā,
T06abhsubhu:3879: rūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā yāvadvijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā /
T06abhsubhu:3888: nāmamātramidaṃ yaduta bodhisattvanāmeti bodhisattva iti prajñāpāramiteti bodhiriti rūpamiti yāvadvijñānamiti /
T06abhsubhu:3889: svabhāvasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam /
T06abhsubhu:3890: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva utpādamapi na samanupaśyati yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati /
T06abhsubhu:3892: kṛtrimaṃ nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnānuvyavahriyante /
T06abhsubhu:3896: tatra abhāvavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva sannityevamādi,
T06abhsubhu:3898: bhāvavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati yāvanna caratīti na samanupaśyati pudgaladharmabhāvapratiṣedhāt
T06abhsubhu:3902: tasminnāmni tena parikalpitena parikalpita svabhāvena virahitatāyāḥ sarvadāstitvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3903: ekatvavikalpaprati pakṣaiṇāha - yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti,
T06abhsubhu:3905: rūpādayo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyatā pariniṣpanna iti /
T06abhsubhu:3911: viśeṣavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - svabhāvasya notpādo yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyatīti,
T06abhsubhu:3914: nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnā vyavahriyante ityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:3915: yathārthanāmavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - tāni bodhisattvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanu paśyannābhiniviśata iti,
T06abhsubhu:3918: tatra pṛthagjanā yadi [a]nityatādikāṃ kāṃcidevadharmatāmārabhya cittaparyavasānaṃ nītvā labdhaparitoṣā bhavantyevametaditi niścinvantaḥ sā teṣāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3920: śrāvakāḥ skandheṣu nityādiviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathāvadrūpādikaṃ dharmadhātuṃ parīkṣamāṇā
T06abhsubhu:3921: lokottareṇa jñānena nairātmyaṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāmaviparyāsanirvikalpatetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3922: bodhisattvāstadapi rūpādidharmamātraṃ prapañca iti viditvā sarvadharmanimittāni vibhāvayantaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3923: paramaśāntena lokottareṇa jñānena sarvatragāṃ tathatāṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3928: atha samatikramatastena dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti sarvatra nirvikalpatā prāpnoti,
T06abhsubhu:3930: tataśca vikalpasya śarīraṃ hi cittacaittāḥ traidhātukā ityasya virodhaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3945: prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyo bodhisattva ityuktaṃ prākkathaṃ tena kālena kālamindriyāṇyutāpayitavyānītyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3947: anyathā tīkṣṇendriyagotrāṇāmindriyāṇāmaikavidhye sati bodhisattvānāmindriyakṛto viśeṣo naivopalabhyate /
T06abhsubhu:3956: pravṛttihetustadyathāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavatītyetayānupūrvyā saṃkleśavyavadānapravṛtteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3961: niṣpandaphalaṃ tadyathā pūrvotpannānāṃ kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsāntānikā uttara kuśalādayo dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3965: yogārthaḥ pañca yogāḥ sāmūhiko yogastadyathā gṛhakāṣṭheṣṭakādīnām /
T06abhsubhu:3970: tathāhi tāsu vartamānaḥ sukhena yukto yāvadduḥkhāsukhena yukta ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3972: tathāhi tasmin sati rāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca yukta ityucyate //
T06abhsubhu:3982: sa punaḥ parijñeyavastvādīnāṃ ṣaṣṇāmarthānāṃ pratisūtraṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3993: aṅgopāṅgamukhaṃ yatraikena padenoddeśaḥ śeṣairnirdeśa iti pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:3995: uttarottaranirhāramukhaṃ yatrottarasyottarasyābhinirharaṇāśrayatvādette dharmā evaṃ deśitā iti pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:4002: tadyathā vāsyaupamyasūtre āsravakṣayamārabhya catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ pratikṣipyante /
T06abhsubhu:4003: ito bāhyaka ihadhārmikaḥ śrutacintāmātrasaṃtuṣṭaḥ bhāvanāyāṃ paritasyamāno 'paripūrṇasaṃbhāraśca /
T06abhsubhu:4004: jānataścāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyataścāsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmītyevamādinā sūtrakhaṇḍenādyaḥ pudgalaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4018: tatrobhayato vatāyaṃ sujātaḥ kulaputraḥ śobhate yacca keśaśmaśrūṇyavahārya yāvat
T06abhsubhu:4020: apraṇāśaprabhedo gāthānugītena darśitaḥ - “śobhate vata bhikṣurayamupaśānto nirāśrava” iti /
T06abhsubhu:4024: dhārayatyanti maṃ dehaṃ jitvā mārasya vāhinīm //
T06abhsubhu:4032: tadyathā audakopame sūtre dvividhau pudgalau tricatuḥprabhedānadhikṛtya bhāṣitam - pṛthagjanaṃ dṛṣṭasatyaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:4040: tadyathānityasūtre - yaḥ sadidaṃ samanupaśyati sarvo 'sau rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
T06abhsubhu:4041: yo vā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati sarvaḥ sa sadidaṃ samanupaśyatīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4043: dvitīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4047: yathā rūpe catuṣkoṭika evaṃ vedanādau sarvatra vistareṇa draṣṭavyam /
T06abhsubhu:4048: yāvadyasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ sarvaḥ sa nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti,
T06abhsubhu:4049: yāvannāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti sarvasya tasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam /
T06abhsubhu:4055: nayamukhaṃ yatra ṣaḍbhirnayairartho varṇyate - tattvārthanayena prāptinayena deśanānayenāntadvayavivarjanānayenācintyanayenābhiprāyanayena ca
T06abhsubhu:4056: eṣāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāṃ nayānāṃ pūrvakāstrayo nayā uttaraistribhirnayairyathākramamanugantavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4057: tadyathāsvādanasūtre - asti bhikṣavaḥ rūpe āsvāda ityevamādināpavādāntaṃ samāropāntaṃ ca varjayitvā tattvārthanayo 'bhidyotitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4060: skandhamātre saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ cānātmanīti pradarśayatā yāvaccāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvadanuttarāṃ
T06abhsubhu:4072: tena prakāreṇa tasya rūpādikasya vastunaḥ parijñānāt /
T06abhsubhu:4090: āvaraṇaprahāṇe nāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt bhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulavihāraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4091: prakārabhedalakṣaṇam - tattvalakṣaṇasya pañcadhā bhedo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
T06abhsubhu:4092: parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06abhsubhu:4094: tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti /
T06abhsubhu:4097: evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha - visaṃyukto vipramukta iti /
T06abhsubhu:4106: balābalamukhaṃ yatraikena padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:4109: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe //
T06abhsubhu:4111: pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate /
T06abhsubhu:4112: tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimavantamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet,
T06abhsubhu:4115: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmairyāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
T06abhsubhu:4118: iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:4124: iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06abhsubhu:4127: iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06abhsubhu:4130: iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhānasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4133: teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4134: tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre - catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodhakā dharmāḥ - śūnyatābhāvanā,
T06abhsubhu:4138: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4147: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:4153: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā,
T06abhsubhu:4156: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam /
T06abhsubhu:4161: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā,
T06abhsubhu:4165: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:4172: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā,
T06abhsubhu:4181: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti - antarāyasukhaprativedhatayā,
T06abhsubhu:4195: prabhidyasaṃdarśana[vi]niścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni / tatra -
T06abhsubhu:4196: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati /
T06abhsubhu:4198: yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4199: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:4200: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:4203: yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4204: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4206: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:4209: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
T06abhsubhu:4210: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
T06abhsubhu:4214: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate /
T06abhsubhu:4215: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
T06abhsubhu:4218: rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam //
T06abhsubhu:4219: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā,
T06abhsubhu:4223: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā /
T06abhsubhu:4227: trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante /
T06abhsubhu:4234: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:4238: yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti /
T06abhsubhu:4243: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4245: ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam //
T06abhsubhu:4247: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
T06abhsubhu:4248: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti //
T06abhsubhu:4275: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4278: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti //
T06abhsubhu:4304: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi /
T06abhsubhu:4305: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4306: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4307: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca //
T06abhsubhu:4308: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā //
T06abhsubhu:4309: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4311: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:4312: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:4313: paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino 'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:4314: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:4315: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:4316: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti,
T06abhsubhu:4320: tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:4322: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau //
T06abhsubhu:4326: yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4333: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta,
T06abhsubhu:4337: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4338: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4339: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4340: athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4342: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
T06abhsubhu:4343: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā /
T06abhsubhu:4345: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4346: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4349: ato 'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti //
T06abhsubhu:4350: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:4351: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti //
T06abhsubhu:4354: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt /
T06abhsubhu:4359: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ
T06abhsubhu:4360: tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra
T06abhsubhu:4364: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt //
T06abhsubhu:4365: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate /
T06abhsubhu:4367: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4374: tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4376: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti /
T06abhsubhu:4392: (Abhidh-s-bh 154) asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4398: akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt,
T06abhsubhu:4404: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:4406: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:4408: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4409: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya /
T06abhsubhu:4410: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4411: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā /
T06abhsubhu:4412: sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:4413: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
T06abhsubhu:4418: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati //
T06abhsubhu:4421: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate /
T06abhsubhu:4422: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati /
T06abhsubhu:4426: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni /
T06abhsubhu:4431: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca,
T06abhsubhu:4453: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
T06abhsubhu:4461: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:4470: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi //
T06abhsubhu:4473: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti //
T06abhsubhu:4483: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4484: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:4490: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:4491: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena
T06abhsubhu:4498: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ //
